attributes.action: put a halt to any plans to store patient information electronically
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The recent disaster regarding the details of prospective doctors has shown us that the government simply does not understand security when it comes to IT systems. This is intended as a vote of no confidence in the government's ability to keep our details secure, and to ask them to put a stop to any plans to store sensitive health records online.
